Distractor grid 2:

▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.<end_of_turn>
